meanings.definition: The plural form of 'quatorze', meaning the number fourteen.
meanings.sent1: During the game, they counted the quatorzes on the board.
meanings.sent2: She had quatorzes of balloons for her birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The quatorzes of cupcakes disappeared in no time at the school bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The quatorzes of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The quatorzes of students in the class made it feel crowded.

meanings.definition: A group of fourteen people or things.
meanings.sent1: The quatorzes of ducks waddled by the pond.
meanings.sent2: They formed quatorzes to play a game of soccer.
meanings.sent3: The quatorzes of pencils on her desk kept rolling off.
meanings.sent4: The quatorzes of flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The quatorzes of books on the shelf were neatly arranged.
